Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Right foot
Description: This sculptors model represents a right foot worked to beyond the ankle. The reproduction is very faithful: notice the hollow of the sole of the foot, the narrowing in the middle and the widening at the top of the top of the ankle. The toes are almost all of the same lenth. There is no socle or squared lines.
